content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, I'll create a comprehensive report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining Operation at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest for collection (position -27.5, -59.5)

### Iron Mining Operation at (-19.0, -50.0) and (-15.0, -50.0)
- Two burner mining drills (positions -19.0, -50.0 and -15.0, -50.0)
- Two wooden chests for collection (positions -18.5, -48.5 and -14.5, -48.5)

### Smelting Complex at (0.0, 0.0)
- Copper smelting: Stone furnace at (-6.0, 0.0)
- Iron smelting: Two stone furnaces at (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
- Collection chests at (-2.5, 0.5), (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 0.5)
- Burner inserters managing material flow at (-1.5, 0.5), (0.5, 1.5), (2.5, 1.5), (3.5, 0.5)

### Assembly Complex
- Copper cable assembler at (18.5, 2.5)
- Electronic circuit assembler at (13.5, 5.5)
- Support chests at (15.5, 2.5), (10.5, 5.5), (16.5, 5.5)
- Burner inserters at (16.5, 2.5), (21.5, 2.5), (11.5, 5.5), (15.5, 5.5)

### Power Generation System at (-12.0, 20.5)
- Boiler at (-12.0, 20.5)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, 20.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe network
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Ensure chests at mining drop positions are not full before attempting to extract
- Empty collection chests regularly when they reach capacity (at positions -27.5, -59.5 and -14.5, -48.5)

### Fuel Management Errors
- Maintain sufficient coal in inventory before attempting to refuel machines
- Regular coal harvesting needed to keep machines operational

### Assembly Machine Issues
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before assembly operations
- Copper cable assembly requires copper plates
- Electronic circuit assembly requires both iron plates and copper cables

### Inserter Operation Issues
- Clear blocked outputs to allow inserters to function properly
- Ensure destination inventory has space before insertion operations

### Resource Collection Issues
- Verify items are present in source location before attempting extraction
- Position agent correctly near the target entity when attempting to extract items
